    • Method Detail

      • containsVector

        public static boolean containsVector​(Polygon polygon,
                                     Vector2D vector)
        Returns true, if the vector is inside the polygon, or false if not. If the point is exactly on the edge it may return true or false.
        Parameters:
        polygon - The polygon.
        vector - The vector.
        Returns:
        True, if the vector is inside the polygon, or false if not.

      • getTouchingLineSegments

        public static java.util.Map<Pair<LineSegment>,​LineSegment> getTouchingLineSegments​(Polygon first,
                                                                                         Polygon second)
        Returns a map of all touching line segments. The key is the pair of line segments that touch and the value is the actual line segment that both lines share. The first element of the key pair is the line segment from the first polygon and vice versa.
        Parameters:
        first - The first polygon.
        second - The second polygon.
        Returns:
        A map of touching line segments.
